title: Muting everyone at the start of a game has resulted in 100xs more pleasant games
body: No stress,  no flame, not having to read flame between other people,   just me, music and my performance in the game. It's very pleasant and fun, anyone else do this?  If not I recommend it.

replies.body:
All honesty, I love to troll around in the chat, but that's an opinion.

As well, I've heard of people listening to music while playing League, but doesn't it distract you from actually playing?

But then you cant communicate with your team and are basically a useless asset.
Pleasant for you, maybe. For the team carrying you, not so much.

Your winrate sort of speaks for itself.. It should not be that low.

i'm in silver, do you honestly think that people effectively communicate? let alone listen to anything i have to say? i didn't carry, so i lost, my communication would have done nothing because i wasn't good enough to carry them, simple as that. It's a waste of time trying to talk to my team when 9 times out of 10 they will ignore me, or they will flame. My winrate is indicative of me being a piece of trash player who can't carry, nothing more, nothing less. I had an akali wanting me to gank when she was 25% health against a 100% life zed with 2 kills up and 30 cs up on her, nothing i said would get her to back down, i ganked, she died, she flamed, she afk'd.

That is why you have a 40% winrate. You need to work on your attitude and your "carry or feed" mentality. 
You have to be incredibly bad to have a 40% winrate based on personal skill, i am sure you are not that mechanically inept.

I don't mute all often but I don't type or read chat too much unless I deem it helpful. I mostly communicate with pings and that is typically enough.

I am pretty sure everyone in silver would play better if chat was disabled for that entire Elo.

Everyone thinks they understand the game, but they don't.
Everyone thinks they can give good advice, but they don't.
Everyone thinks insulting teammates will improve their play, but it doesn't.
that is why im in favor of removing chat from the game all together cant flame rage or be a toxic ahole if there is no chat

I do that very often now. I'll let everyone on my team know in champ select that I mute everyone, and to please communicate with me using pings. It usually works out nicely, the flame shield works flawlessly.
But then you don't get to play with me, and here me tell you how good you are doing D:
I do it any time I'm wanting to climb. Chat is useless.
